name: Life's Loop
description:
Have you been wondering if your life is just an endless loop of going work, few hours of entertainment and sleep?

Change it. Break the loop.

Your task is to balance your physical, mental and social health by making the right decisions. The game ends if your green healthbar either gets to 0 or you win if you manage to get it to 100.
Your overall Health is added at the end of the day by the state of your other healthbars (Keep it all above the half and you'll be fine).

To control the game u only need a mouse.

Will you really be the one who will break out of your endless routine or will you get lost in the ocean of tombstones trying?
